name: TextUtills
desc: TextUtils is a simple and user-friendly text manipulation tool built with React. It allows you to easily convert text to uppercase, lowercase, and remove spaces etc

name: Snake Game
desc: Expertly engineered and integrated the fundamental game mechanics, encompassing fluid snake movement, progressive length augmentation, and reliable collisiondetection.

name: Car Parking System
desc: This project determines that a vechile is inside or outside the parking. It stores the time zone of parking peroid safe and securely.

name: TechBook
desc: Native android app built using Java, XML. Retrofit & Glide dependencies. Provides different category news.
